container.title: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
container.description: "Young successful businessman Moon Soo-hoo (Kim Rae-won) graduated from medical school and works as an entrepreneur in the community projects. Every year, he spends the Christmas holidays in Slovenia, hoping to meet his childhood love, Kim Hae-ra (Shin Se-kyung). One day, a cheerful and optimistic travel agent Kim Hae-ra meets Soo-hoo, who is mistaken to be a photographer, at a quaintly town of Slovenia. Without knowing Soo-hoo’s true identity, they spend a romantic quality time together for a day. Their pure romance faces challenges from Soo-hoo's ex wife and boutique fashion tailor Sharon (Seo Ji-hye) and Hae-ra's ex-boyfriend Choi Ji-hoon (Kim Hyun-joon). Meanwhile, the immortal woman Jang Baek-hee (Jang Mi-hee) tries to help them stay together. Can they get back together while overcoming their dangerous fate? Also known as, Black Knight: The Man Who Guards me, Black Knight (흑기사)is a 2017 supernatural Korean TV drama series directed by Han Sang-woo. "

item.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 1
item.description: Soo Ho visits the old castle in Slovenia every Christmas to wait for the lady he's been waiting for every year. Hae Ra has a boyfriend who's a prosecutor, but he confesses that he's been lying to her about it. After getting huge shock from her boyfriend, Hae Ra wanders about the streets and ends up in Sharon Tailor.
item.episode_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 1
item.moviealbumshowname: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
item.cpchannel: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
item.display_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 1
item.tags: KBS, Fresh Releases, Korean Drama, Romance, Fantasy, Black Knight, The Man Who Guards Me, Television, Drama

item.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 2
item.description: Hae Ra has a great time with Soo Ho, thinking that he's the photographer that she's supposed to meet up with. After Hae Ra returns from Slovenia, she visits Sharon Tailor again, but Sharon gets upset at Hae Ra for not making any appointments before visiting her.
item.episode_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 2
item.moviealbumshowname: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
item.cpchannel: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
item.display_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 2
item.tags: KBS, Fresh Releases, Korean Drama, Romance, Fantasy, Black Knight, The Man Who Guards Me, Television, Drama

item.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 3
item.description: Hae Ra suddenly has to live with Soo Ho because Soo Ho bought the house Aunt Sook Hee put on the market and she has nowhere else to stay. Meanwhile, Hae Ra finds Sharon in one of her old photos and thinks it's strange that Sharon hasn't aged at all.
item.episode_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 3
item.moviealbumshowname: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
item.cpchannel: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
item.display_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 3
item.tags: KBS, Fresh Releases, Korean Drama, Romance, Fantasy, Black Knight, The Man Who Guards Me, Television, Drama

item.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 4
item.description: Young Mi visits where Hae Ra is staying and runs into Soo Ho. Young Mi suggests having a couples' meeting with Hae Ra and Soo Ho. Meanwhile, Soo Ho meets Baek Hee after a long time and hears a story about the land where he will build a hotel.
item.episode_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 4
item.moviealbumshowname: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
item.cpchannel: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
item.display_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 4
item.tags: KBS, Fresh Releases, Korean Drama, Romance, Fantasy, Black Knight, The Man Who Guards Me, Television, Drama

item.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 5
item.description: Sharon becomes extremely jealous when she finds out that Soo Ho and Hae Ra kissed. Baek Hee invites both Soo Ho and Hae Ra to her book event and tells a story of Soo Ho and Hae Ra's past, but they have no idea that it's their story.
item.episode_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 5
item.moviealbumshowname: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
item.cpchannel: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
item.display_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 5
item.tags: KBS, Fresh Releases, Korean Drama, Romance, Fantasy, Black Knight, The Man Who Guards Me, Television, Drama

item.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 6
item.description: Baek Hee confesses the sin she committed in the past to Sharon, but Sharon doesn't believe it. Soo Ho suggests to Hae Ra to date him for a month and tells her she can dump him if she still doesn't like him then.
item.episode_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 6
item.moviealbumshowname: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
item.cpchannel: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
item.display_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 6
item.tags: KBS, Fresh Releases, Korean Drama, Romance, Fantasy, Black Knight, The Man Who Guards Me, Television, Drama

item.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 7
item.description: Sharon uses Hae Ra's body to mess Hae Ra and Soo Ho's relationship, but it doesn't go as planned. Baek Hee finds out about it and warns Sharon that she might get in a big trouble if she does it again. Meanwhile, Gon asks Ji Hoon to spy on Soo Ho.
item.episode_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 7
item.moviealbumshowname: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
item.cpchannel: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
item.display_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 7
item.tags: KBS, Fresh Releases, Korean Drama, Romance, Fantasy, Black Knight, The Man Who Guards Me, Television, Drama

item.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 8
item.description: Soo Ho is attacked by a motorcycle, but he's saved by Hae Ra. Sharon visits Soo Ho's house to find out if Hae Ra and Soo Ho are really living together. Meanwhile, Baek Hee meets an old friend who knows both Baek Hee and Sharon.
item.episode_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 8
item.moviealbumshowname: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
item.cpchannel: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
item.display_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 8
item.tags: KBS, Fresh Releases, Korean Drama, Romance, Fantasy, Black Knight, The Man Who Guards Me, Television, Drama

item.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 9
item.description: Ji Hoon visits Soo Ho's house for the appointed home training, and Hae Ra is surprised to see him at home. Sharon brings Hae Ra's clothes to Soo Ho's house without any prior notice and meets Ji Hoon there.
item.episode_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 9
item.moviealbumshowname: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
item.cpchannel: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me
item.display_title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 9
item.tags: KBS, Fresh Releases, Korean Drama, Romance, Fantasy, Black Knight, The Man Who Guards Me, Television, Drama

item.title: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 10
item.description: Hae Ra tries her best to convince Sharon to work with her, but Sharon ends up hurting Hae Ra. Baek Hee and Sharon get another tattoo because of that. Meanwhile, Soo Ho invites Baek Hee to his house for dinner.
item.actor: Kim Rae Won,Shin Se Kyung,Seo Ji Hye

item.title: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 11
item.description: Sharon tells Soo Ho that she won't sell her property unless he lets her stay in his place for a month. Sharon plans to seduce him, but things don't go as planned. Meanwhile, Gon visits Sharon Tailor and asks Sharon to make him a suit.
item.actor: Kim Rae Won,Shin Se Kyung,Seo Ji Hye

item.title: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 12
item.description: Sharon shows the articles about Dr. Moon and his lab to Soo Ho, and Soo Ho gets reminded of the fire accident. Soo Ho goes on a live show and announces that he will ask for a reinvestigation on the fire accident.
item.actor: Kim Rae Won,Shin Se Kyung,Seo Ji Hye

item.title: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 13
item.description: Baek Hee brings Sharon along to look for Jeom Bok, thinking that finding him would solve their problem. Sharon finds out that Hae Ra has the ring, so she steals it from Hae Ra’s room. Meanwhile, Hae Ra tells Soo Ho about the secret her dad's been keeping from him.
item.actor: Kim Rae Won,Shin Se Kyung,Seo Ji Hye

item.title: Black Knight - The Man Who Guards Me - Episode 14
item.description: Hae Ra leaves Soo Ho's house because of a letter that Chul Min sent to her. Soo Ho tells Sharon to leave the house right away after finding her looking through his stuff inside his room. Meanwhile, Baek Hee meets the descendent of Jeom Bok at an art gallery.
item.actor: Kim Rae Won,Shin Se Kyung,Seo Ji Hye
